resources.string: Due to your hourly settings your distribution capped at:
Due to your daily basal not being a multiple of 3 you may experience a remainder in your results
IMPORTANT: Enter your personal settings by pressing the gear icon
How to enter the numbers will be described in the following image
Enter the values from the previous example from left to right in order
Unfortunately due to the need to round to the second decimal place sometimes the result will be up to .02 off
